import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Line}from"react-chartjs-2";import{Chart as ChartJS,CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend}from"chart.js";// Register the necessary components with Chart.js
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend);const NewCustomer=_ref=>{let{fetchedData}=_ref;console.log(fetchedData);const labels=fetchedData.map(item=>item._id);const counts=fetchedData.map(item=>item.count);const data={labels:labels,datasets:[{label:"New Customers Added Over Time",data:counts,borderColor:"rgba(63, 186, 76,1)",fill:false}]};const options={scales:{y:{beginAtZero:true,title:{display:true,text:"New Customers"}},x:{title:{display:true,text:"Time"}}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-white p-4 rounded-md shadow-lg",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:data,options:options})});};export default NewCustomer;
